title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information. Every time the dialog is closed and reopened, the filter settings are reset to their default values.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist filter information. It should remember the filter settings even if the dialog is closed and reopened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Set any filter criteria or conditions.
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog and verify that the filter settings have been reset.
